txt.en: Dráttur is located in Amdân.\n\nBring the wood to Dráttur.
'A good haul you've brought. Our fires will burn strong this night.'

'Days in this valley are barely warmer than the frigid nights here. While you are out in the forest, gather fallen branches for firewood, that we might not freeze our beards off out here. You will be competing with Orcs who stalk the forests for resources, so mind yourself. Defeat the stalkers as you see them, that we might have less enemies to resist our attacks. You may even find stacks of wood they have already cut for themselves.'
The frigid winds that whip through the valley of Azanulbizar can cut through even the thickest beard. Fires burn brightly but quickly, and fuel for their hungry flames is always in demand.
Wood for burning and valley-stalking Orcs can be found in the forests outside of Amdân.\n\nYou should gather wood and defeat Moria valley-stalkers.
